content: I'm planning to test the car's new suspension setup during an open track day at the VIRginia International Raceway today. I'll make sure to pay attention to the car's behavior and body roll, and I'll take notes on how the car responds to different driving styles and corners. If I notice excessive body roll, I'll consider making adjustments to the coilovers, such as lowering the ride height, increasing the spring rate, or stiffening the damping. I'll also check the camber and toe settings to ensure they're within the recommended specifications.
